mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure that all images are optimized for mobile devices to avoid slow load times on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Consider using compressed images and minifying CSS/JavaScript to improve load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve title tags, meta descriptions, and use structured data to enhance search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Improve navigation by making menus more accessible on mobile and desktop devices.
bookingFlowTip: Offer more booking options like flexible dates and room types for a smoother experience.
tips: Increase SEO efforts by regularly updating content with local attractions or events to improve visibility.
Optimize website for faster loading on all devices.
Ensure the contact information is easy to find and include a map for directions.
